alt: screenshot of my old portfolio, which featured a lot of photos of waves breaking on the beach
text: Time to upgrade from [this portfolio](https://mvmolloy.github.io/portfolio/) which I last used two years ago. Come on a fair way since then. Feel free to have a look at my [cringe old projects](https://mvmolloy.github.io/portfolio/#projects) üëÄ

title: Walking on Water by Cara Thompson
text:
> Next time you're feeling lost, and find your strengh begins to falter, cast your eye to the canals and know you too can walk on water. 
 > 
 > -- Cara Thompson
At the world's biggest accessibility conference. Missed it? Catch up with [session recordings now available](https://www.deque.com/axe-con/schedule/).

alt: red cockapoo puppy sleepy on the laptop keyboard
photos of canals arranged in a mockup of the 'rate this scene' tool
text: It's not every ticket that ends up in international news coverage. Starting off the year right with [Rate This Scene](https://canalrivertrust.org.uk/actnowforcanals-and-look-after-the-blue-and-green-space-on-your-doorstep/the-science-of-scenic-beauty/rate-this-scene).
